subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bernhard Langer hopes to celebrate his 50th birthday a day early today by claiming an unlikely victory at the KLM Open at Zandvoort, the Netherlands.Langer, a two-time Masters champion, was four strokes off the lead heading into the final round after carding a third-round 67 yesterday that left him at five under par. A victory would make Langer, a German, the oldest European Tour winner, and would give him a 43rd tour title.
